property.name: text
property.value:
This model simulates a 3-D pendulum bouncing on a flat surface, as shown in the figure on the right.
A pendulum collides with the surface of the cart and bounces back with some energy loss, which is specified by the lambda parameter. There is no extra force except the gravitational force on the pendulum.
This is a Zeno model. We use two states for pre-Zeno and post-Zeno dynamics respectively, showing how to design systems that get past Zeno points.

property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Haiyang Zheng, Robert D. Gregg, Aaron D. Ames

svg.text: This example requires Java3D. If you do not have it installed, you can get it from: https://java3d.java.net/

property.name: setActions
